overview: Lollos's laughter has gone away and he can not get it anywhere! Disco, Lettie, Minki and Karla host an exciting talent competition in which everyone gets a chance to perform a hilarious item. Find out if Lollos will find his laughter agai... (With a special appearance by ADAM, Lenka and Lalaland's Foempies)
title: Lollos 8: Skaterlag
